subject: Re: Proposal for a new CDD sub-project: Debian4Business
body:
Hi Luis,

Am Donnerstag 19 April 2007 13:06 schrieb Luis Matos:
> what are your plans?

Are you talking about Debian-Edu aka Skolelinux here?
The project is preparing the release of version 3.0 now.

Cf. http://wiki.debian.org/DebianEdu or 
    http://www.skolelinux.org

I think there is a lot you could re-use (like build server).

Regards
Ralf


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
